layout.name: name
layout.title: Name
layout.tooltip: Name of the path, to identify it.

layout.name: points
layout.title: Points
layout.tooltip: The points of the spline, in order, separated by a comma.

layout.name: types
layout.title: Types
layout.tooltip: The types of path used for each point, in order, separated by a comma.

layout.name: hideIfLocked
layout.title: Hide if Locked
layout.tooltip: If ticked, the path will be invisible when locked.

children.name: isLockedSMB3
children.title: Is Locked (SMB3)
children.tooltip: Unrelated to the locked system already in place. If checked, the player won't go through this path, even if it's visible. For this path to be unlocked, either a level must be completed, or the player must use a hammer from the map inventory.

children.name: canUnlockWhenBeatingLevelSMB3
children.title: Unlock After Winning a Level (SMB3)
children.tooltip: If checked, the level (After beating) will unlock the path. This won't affect whether hammers can be used or not.

children.name: levelBeatBeforeUnlockedSMB3
children.title: Unlock Level Filename (SMB3)
children.tooltip: Filename of the level that will unlock this path if beat with any win type above 0.
